column3: Slowfix is concerned about the state of Idyllshire.

Slowfix is worried by the increasing number of organizational and administrative problems surfacing in Idyllshire. He needs the advice of a goblin with more of a head for these sorts of things─Dripwix. Unfortunately, Dripwix is nowhere to be seen. Slowfix asks you to track down Dripwix for him. Start by asking Midnight Dew. She should know where he is.
Midnight Dew tells you that Dripwix should be headed towards the Arkhitekton, in the Dravanian hinterlands. Hopefully you will be able to find him before the Illuminati do.
You find Dripwix just as a group of Illuminati goblins descend upon him. Save him by slaying his assailants.
Dripwix thanks you for saving him from the Illuminati's attack.
Search for Dripwix near the Arkhitekton.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Idyllshire's problems grow more and more. Is very unorganized! Slowfix become very unrelaxed!
Slowfix needs advice. To fix these problems, need to talk with sharpbrain gobbie. Slowfix needs to talk with Dripwix. Dripwix can help!
But Slowfix cannot find him! Please help, uplander. Please find Dripwix. Perhaps Midnight Dew knows where he is.
Please find Dripwix! Maybe Midnight Dew knows where he is!
You're lookin' for Dripwix? Last I saw he was headin' towards the Arkhitekton. I hope he hasn't gone and got himself caught by the Illuminati...
Still lookin' for Dripwix? Did you take a look near the Arkhitekton?

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
You─you saved Dripwix? You are very widehearted uplander!
